casebody.data:
No. 10-135. B. R. Hudson, Petitioner v. Hilarie G. Scarbro, Administratrix of the Estate of Gary Eugene Rummer. 562 U.S. 981, 131 S. Ct. 415,

178 L. Ed. 2d 323,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8149. October 18, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 374 Fed. Appx. 366.
